CHAT.comment: JOHN ROBERTSON, Petitioner v. UNITED STATES, EX REL. WYKENNA WATSON.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:16 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JACLYN S. FRANKFURT ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF ROBERT A. LONG ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
ORAL ARGUMENT OF ELENA KAGAN ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF JACLYN S. FRANKFURT ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 12:27 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
